name: Help the Homeless - Somerset
description: Non-profit organization providing essential services and support for individuals experiencing homelessness in Somerset and Pulaski County. Offers emergency assistance, case management, and resources to help people transition from homelessness to stable housing. NOTE: This organization replaced the former 'Over My Head' shelter which permanently closed in September 2022.
source: Verified from official Facebook page, news articles, and local sources
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM, and by appointment
notes: This organization replaced the former 'Over My Head' shelter which permanently closed in September 2022. Help the Homeless provides essential services to the homeless population in Somerset and surrounding areas. Contact via phone or text for assistance and appointments.
